short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggest colors based on selected style.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your design process with the Color Suggestion Extension! This handy tool helps you choose the perfect color palette for any style you desire. Whether you're working on a minimalist project, creating a vintage aesthetic, or aiming for a modern look, our extension provides you with a curated selection of colors to match your chosen style.

Features:
Style Selection: Choose from various styles such as Minimalist, Vintage, Modern, and Classic.
Color Suggestions: Get a visual representation of suggested colors along with their hex codes.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a sleek, modern design that is easy to navigate.
Instant Results: See color suggestions immediately after selecting a style.
With the Color Suggestion Extension, you can enhance your creativity and streamline your design workflow. Perfect for designers, artists, and anyone who loves playing with colors!
